EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! Your official Invite to NCS Ambassador Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Congratulations! You are one step closer to being an NCS Ambassador!
We would like to invite you to take the next step in becoming an NCS Ambassador - a key part of the NCS team!
Training Event THIS HALF TERM! - Exclusive all day training event Build upon your presentation skills and confidence - Gain an insight into the world of promotions and marketing - Meet the Ambassador team!
Register NOW! - Click here to select the date and location you would like to attend - Lunch is provided and both venues are fully accessible
Because we rely on our Ambassadors to be amazing representatives of NCS, training is essential. If you are unable to attend either of these events but still want to be involved as an Ambassador, let us know as soon as possible by emailing tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge will offer support for any young person with additional needs to attend our events. Just get in touch on the above email.
We look forward to seeing you.
Graduate Team
